website_summaries.verdict: A cleanser that moisturizes well and is suitable for all skin types.
pros: Light soapy scent won’t bother people sensitive to smells
Great for multiple skin types, including combination skin
Creamy texture is pleasant to cleanse with
Washes away clean and hydrates the skin well
cons: May not remove all of your make-up

customer_reviews.title: It feels perfect! I also love that I can use less ...
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the few cleansers I’ve found that doesn’t irritate my sensistive, dehydrated, acne prone skin! My face doesn’t feel overly dry after using, nor does it feel oily. It feels perfect! I also love that I can use less than a full pump. Combined with my skincare routine, this has my skin feeling great, and I’m so glad I found it! The consistency is almost like a cream, and half a pump is more than enough to wash a face
customer_reviews.author: JessicaTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: I have been using for 3 months over the winter and really love the way my skin feels
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the nicest cream cleansers I have ever used. There is no scent (yay!) and it goes on so creamy and rinses clean. I have been using for 3 months over the winter and really love the way my skin feels, not tight at all after cleansing. I am in my mid-50s and have normal to dry skin. I will reorder but may try another light cleanser from Paula's Choice for the summer.
customer_reviews.author: R. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: I'm really happy with this facial wash
customer_reviews.text: I'm really happy with this facial wash. I can wash my face without it being dried out. Even around my eyes it does not leave me parched. I am very happy with the feel of the wash. It's soft as you massage it in to the skin. It washes off easily and I've been very happy with it. I will purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: Sheshered

customer_reviews.title: Pump broken
customer_reviews.text: While I love this cleanser...this is my second order and my only complaint is that the bottle was broken when I received it. The pump fell off after I opened the packaging and it won't reattach. I'm not returning it, but I have to open it by unscrewing the top. Slight inconvenience. Again, the cleanser I love.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter

customer_reviews.title: 10 years younger
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these products for years. Most people think I'm my 22 year old sons girlfriend. I'm in my late 4o's. Now I'm not bragging. I just think that the products work and I'm living proof. I started young avoided the sun smoking and alcohol. Research Paula's products and figure out the regime that will work best for yourself and try them they are unbelievable. The ingredients are quality no animal testing and the research is there at an affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't actually remove any makeup
customer_reviews.text: I know this is a gentle facewash - however it was so gentle that it didn't actually wash off any makeup and I only usually wear a tinted moisturizer and a tiny bit of eyeliner and mascara. After washing my face, I use a washcloth and there's still tinted moisturizer and none of the eyeliner is removed. I did try using a cotton pad with the cleanser to remove eye makeup and it still doesn't wash away clean. It doesn't have any fragrance, and is moisturizing, but I really need a cleanser that can at least wash off dirt and tinted moisturizer.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Works Without Drying
customer_reviews.text: The good: this removes makeup and (with a washcloth) my titanium sunscreen. It's one of the few cleansers that doesn't leave my skin feeling tight & dry after. The bad? The cost per ounce. I'm keeping an eye out for something cheaper, because while this works it's no holy grail.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Too Expensive
customer_reviews.text: It’s very expensive and it works just as well as my Cera Ve Hydrating Facial Wash. I expect it to be a bigger bottle for the price. I’ve only used it once. I plan to go through it.
customer_reviews.author: This Girl

customer_reviews.title: Must try if you have dry skin!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! I have super dry skin and this product is by far the best! My skin looks super hydrated after every wash and looks so good in the mornings.
customer_reviews.author: Sani

customer_reviews.title: Heaven for dry skin!
customer_reviews.text: This cleanser is rich, creamy, emollient, and rinses cleanly. It is not fragranced and does not irritate my skin at all. My dry, acne prone skin loves this and this will likley be my new daily cleanser.
customer_reviews.author: Hollyanna Call

customer_reviews.title: Yes!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, it's not 100% on make-up removal but I do double-cleanse anyway. It's gentle on the skin and combined with Paula's Choice--CLEAR Acne Cleanser--For Facial, makes the perfect duo.
customer_reviews.author: Ju

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS CLEANSER!
customer_reviews.text: I love the product, but the pump was broken. It was in a sealed bag so it must have broken in transit.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Lamoreaux

customer_reviews.title: mixed feelings on this
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t take enough makeup / sunscreen off however it’s way better for dry skin than many foamy drugstore brands. I’d rather use it as part of a double cleanse routine than on its own. Also I’d buy the CeraVe Hydrating Cleanser because this was way overpriced
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Sadique

customer_reviews.title: Five stars
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for years and years. I sometimes switch with something new - they say it's better like that - but I came back to this every time!! I recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Gabianza

customer_reviews.title: Hydrating
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my go to cleansers for Fall/Winter. It is very hydrating and doesn't really have a strong scent.
customer_reviews.author: Ty

customer_reviews.title: Love Paula’s choice products
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Hydrating. I have Acne prone skin and I haven't Had break outs.
customer_reviews.author: leltb

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product, perfect for my combination sensitive skin. This is the best cleanser I've ever used, and I've tried many!
customer_reviews.author: raffaella

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive and dry skin
customer_reviews.text: I have really dry skin and eczema. I have been searching for a cleanser that would not dry me out or irritate my skin. This is the first one I’ve found that has really made a positive improvement in my skin. I highly recommend for anyone with dry skin or sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: melissa

customer_reviews.title: Unsure of product because it broke
customer_reviews.text: I was very much looking forward to using this cleanser, but upon its arrival I noticed that the pump had completely broken off from the rest of the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Sabreen R

customer_reviews.title: Good for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: My skin is so sensitive, many products in various price ranges cause me to get lots of little pimples, but this does not. It removes my make up. It doesn't overdry.
customer_reviews.author: Jwaddell

customer_reviews.title: I love the cleanser
customer_reviews.text: I love the cleanser. It is very soothing and great for my dry skin. It leaves my skin feeling clean and moisturized (you don't get that overly tight feeling after you use the cleanser). My only complaint is that it does not come in a bigger value size. I have been using Paula's choice products for a while and this is my favorite cleanser from them.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Liang

customer_reviews.title: Best Products for Skin Care.  Loves!
customer_reviews.text: I love these products. My all new favorite skin care line.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: ... using this cleanser for a few years and I love it; my skin feels clean
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this cleanser for a few years and I love it; my skin feels clean, soft and smooth after using it. I have confidence with Paula's Choice's skin care products, they are of high quality yet very affordable and reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful cleanser that's gentle enough to use twice a day. It has a lovely scent and leaves my skin feeling clean, smooth, and restored.
customer_reviews.author: skilletlicker

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this cleanser! Super hydrating. My skin feels very soft after using. I will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Mary a pennington

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Great for sensitive skin! I have acne, eczema and overall very sensitive facial skin. This wash doesn’t irritate, dry or cause my skin to breakout in any way. Best face wash I’ve ever used. My face has never felt softer or more balanced.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Baranyai

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice creamy texture. Did not dry out skin. Good for winter or dry skin.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha B.

customer_reviews.title: This is the first time I have used any of ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I have used any of Paula's choice products. The Optimal Skin Cleanser makes my skin feel so clean, soft, & refreshed. After only a few weeks of using it my skin is feeling healthier!
customer_reviews.author: Martha

customer_reviews.title: love this cleanser
customer_reviews.text: I love this cleanser! It is very light and really helps with black heads
customer_reviews.author: ART

customer_reviews.title: moisturizing but no deep clean
customer_reviews.text: it's super creamy & moisturizing. my skin doesn't feel stripped of moisture after using it but it doesn't really remove makeup so it doesn't leave my skin feeling as clean as it should be. i'll use the rest of the bottle but likely repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: NayDee

customer_reviews.title: Broken packaging- had to return
customer_reviews.text: I received my bottle of cleanser with a giant crack at the bottom of the product , leaving me unable to use it. So now I have to return it 😡
customer_reviews.author: karina lingesso

customer_reviews.title: Cleanser
customer_reviews.text: Love it. This cleanser does not leave a greasy feeling.
customer_reviews.author: Cherry M.

customer_reviews.title: I would defiantly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Have only been using for 2 days and can dramatically see a difference in my skin.. I would defiantly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Dawson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for my older skin
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Many cleansers leave my skin feeling dry, but this did not. So happy with all of the Paula's Choice products I have tried so far.
customer_reviews.author: Cherie L.Willhide

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this stuff for years - love it, light and not drying.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Murphy

customer_reviews.title: This cleanser is wonderful. I've been using Paula's Choice products for years ...
customer_reviews.text: This cleanser is wonderful. I've been using Paula's Choice products for years and I haven't found anything better for my sensitive skin. It is the best!
customer_reviews.author: SHERRY

customer_reviews.title: Didn't meet my expectations. Maybe that's why my skin ...
customer_reviews.text: Didn't meet my expectations. Maybe the reason is that my skin isn't so dry. I don't feel my face is squeaky clean after washing.
customer_reviews.author: irem e.

customer_reviews.title: I don't feel clean afterewards
customer_reviews.text: Does not wash my makeup off and I don't feel clean afterwards
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love PC skincare
customer_reviews.text: I love PC skincare. This cleanser is perfect for my 40something dry to normal skin. I don't wear foundation so I can't comment on its makeup removal power, but it leaves my skin clean and not tight or dry. I follow with PC resist toner, then the bha 5% lotion, then the retinol Serum in the pink/purple tube, then the light 30% tinted sunscreen moisturizer. Some days I skip a step but it all takes just a couple minutes. My skin looks excellent in my opinion!
customer_reviews.author: Joy3141

customer_reviews.title: Hello Clear Skin!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! To say I’m impressed would be an understatement. I usually use Kate Somerville’s Goat Milk Cleanser, but because that’s expensive for my budget at the moment I decided to try this instead. I have sensitive, acne prone skin that can get very red and irritated by certain ingredients. Luckily I didn’t have any negative reactions to this and I loved how gentle it was on my skin! I really reccomend this cleanser, especially if you’re use to using high end skincare and need a replacement or simply looking to test the waters!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Finally, I found the one
customer_reviews.text: I've tried several hydrating cleansers over the years for my dry skin and this one takes the cake. It's a VERY thick creamy formula that feels so buttery soft on the skin. It won't strip your skin at all and unlike some hydrating cleanser this one will not leave a film behind. My skin feels clean and hydrated afterwards which is exactly what I want from a cleanser.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Smith

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Cleanser
customer_reviews.text: I love how this cleanser feels moisturizing when I use it. 2 pumps is all you need. It takes off 99% all of my makeup (a teensy amount stays in the inner corner of my eyes) and the texture is nice as well. Another perk this cleanser has is no fragrance! I am new to Paula's Choice products and I am now a converter! Awesome products! This product is also very reasonably priced. I appreciate that as it's not the easiest to find such a wonderful cleanser under $25-$30. I also use the Super Antioxidant Concentrate Serum....AMAZING!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie K.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I really like this cleanser, my face feels clean but not too dry after using. I will note that I do not wear foundation so I am unsure if this is good at removing makeup.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Never buying another face wash again!
customer_reviews.text: This is the most natural facewash I have ever used. I am trying so hard to use natural products that are not tested on animals. This is my new go to facewash!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Best face wash - removes makeup, does not over dry yet no residue left on my face. I use it with Clarisonic or on its own. Does not irritate sensitive skin. Once I tried Paula's Choice I haven't used any other skin care line. Doe
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very creamy & moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: This facial wash got my face super clean without drying it out. I have dry skin & eczema on my face and it was NOT irritated! Will purchase again & from here on out.
customer_reviews.author: FANCY

customer_reviews.title: Like Paula’s Choice
customer_reviews.text: I have had good results with PC products. I do not notice any scent in this moisturizer and I always find scents are irritating.
customer_reviews.author: DMH

customer_reviews.title: My favorite cleanser
customer_reviews.text: I have dry skin and this is the only PC cleanser I have found that doesn’t leave my skin feeling tight. This is a PC product I’m never without.
customer_reviews.author: J. Adkins

customer_reviews.title: Best moisturizing face wash
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful face wash that never dries out my combination skin type. I am 52 and love this very emollient moisturizing wash! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Pump stopped working after 6 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Pump broke 6 weeks after ordering-No way to contact seller through Amazon. Ugggh! Can't use it unless I'm actually pouring it now.
customer_reviews.author: betsallonu

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Price point is s bit high for the item. Nothing much special about it you couldn't get for cheaper elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald

customer_reviews.title: No “Clean” Feeling
customer_reviews.text: Product is okay; feels like lotion going on your face so you do not get the “clean” feeling. I would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: You need to try Paula's Skin Care Line
customer_reviews.text: The best skin care line you can buy. The products work!
customer_reviews.author: Deb Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Cleanser at a Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this cleanser. Removes makeup well and a little goes a long way!
customer_reviews.author: E. Coughlin

customer_reviews.title: Is not drying
customer_reviews.text: I love most Paula's Choice products and this cleanser cleans well without drying my skin.
customer_reviews.author: another know it all

customer_reviews.title: in fact it feels like there's still lotion on my skin after I repeatedly ...
customer_reviews.text: The reviews I read on this product were all stellar but I found the product lacking. It definitely hydrates, in fact it feels like there's still lotion on my skin after I repeatedly rinse. That's okay, hydrated skin looks younger, but after using the product for two days my skin started to break out. That's not okay, I've continued to use it hoping my skin would calm down (and also to get use of the money I spent) but I will not be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: NJ

customer_reviews.title: drying
customer_reviews.text: I didn't care for this. I have combination skin and found it to be to drying.
customer_reviews.author: Pj

customer_reviews.title: Excellent pre cleanser for sensitive breakout prone skin
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. I have a sensitive skin, breakout prone. I use it as a pre cleanser followed by acne.org cleansing gel
customer_reviews.author: Oulzo

customer_reviews.title: Great for dry skin!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome face wash no perfume no harsh ingredients, love the way it goes on like a moisturizer but washes off squeaky clean without drying out my face.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Hinck

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great cleanser for dry skin. Great price and does the job
customer_reviews.author: Diana L.

customer_reviews.title: I do not recommend this for anyone
customer_reviews.text: This product was very drying and actually made my eyelids crack and bleed. I do not recommend this for anyone.
customer_reviews.author: SunshineMom

product_meta.title: Paula's Choice RESIST Optimal Results Hydrating Cleanser, Green Tea & Chamomile, Anti-Aging Face Wash, Dry Skin, 6.4 Ounce
feature_bullets: HYDRATING FACE WASH Restore your face to it's natural state of moisture & suppleness while cleansing & removing makeup. Gently cleanses without dehydrating or leaving skin feeling tight. Contains skin restoring ingredients safe for use in eye area

Paula's Choice RESIST Optimal Results Hydrating Facial Cleanser replenishes moisture and helps to preserve skin's healthy barrier while effectively cleansing skin. The result? Visibly smoother hydrated softer and younger-looking skin with each use!

Use RESIST Optimal Results Hydrating Facial Cleanser twice daily as part of your morning and evening skin care routines along with your favorite Paula's Choice toner, exfoliator, serums, spot treatments, and moisturizer with SPF for daytime wear.

Paula's Choice products are made with YOUR SKIN in mind. Whatever your skincare concern, whether dryness, acne, fine lines, or sensitive skin; we've got a treatment line for you. The search for amazing skin care ends here. Finally, you found it.
Paula's Choice Skincare makes products that work. No fragrance, no parabens, no fluff. Just effective, science-backed formulas that target any concern from wrinkles to breakouts.
